name: And The Chocolate Factory
description:
You recently bought a chocolate factory, just to find it empty!

In each level, you need to create certain types of chocolate bars in certain paces.

The ingredients are supplied to you through the gray-boxes.

The final product must be put inside the drain (the moving blue lines at the right hand side of the screen)

Controls:

Arrow keys - move

Mouse - buy/sell machine

E - pick up/place machine

Q - pick up/place/drop ingridient/product

A+D - rotate held machine (if there is enough room)

Credits:

Developers - Ittai Rubinstein and Tom Kalvari
